mapper.update: UPDATE pub_vehicle set pub_vehicle.`Status` = 2 WHERE pub_vehicle.id=#{id}

SELECT t.id, t.vehclineid, CONCAT(t2.`Name`," ",t1.`name`) AS brandCars, getPlatenoStr(t.platenoprovince,t.platenocity,t.plateno) as platenoStr, t.vin, t.color, getCityStr(t.city) as cityStr, t_driver.workstatus, t.boundstate, t4.`name` AS serviceCars, t.loads, t.vehicletype, t.vehiclestatus, t4.level as level FROM pub_vehicle t LEFT JOIN pub_driver t_driver on t_driver.id = t.driverid LEFT JOIN pub_vehcline t1 ON t.vehclineid = t1.Id and t1.`Status`='1' and t1.platformtype = #{platformtype} LEFT JOIN pub_vehcbrand t2 ON t1.vehcBrandID = t2.Id and t2.`Status`='1' and t2.platformtype =#{platformtype} LEFT JOIN op_vehcline_models_ref t3 ON t.vehclineid = t3.vehclineid and t3.`Status` ='1' LEFT JOIN op_vehiclemodels t4 ON t4.Id = t3.vehiclemodelsid and t4.`Status` = '1' WHERe t.platformtype = #{platformtype} and t.`Status`='1' and t.vehclineid = t1.Id
ORDER BY CONVERT (getCityStr(t.city) USING gbk) COLLATE gbk_chinese_ci, t.vehicletype DESC, (CASE t.`vehicletype` WHEN 0 THEN t4.level ELSE 1 END)asc, (CASE t_driver.`workstatus` WHEN 2 THEN 1 WHEN 0 THEN 2 WHEN 1 THEN 3 ELSE 0 END) LIMIT #{iDisplayStart} ,#{iDisplayLength}

SELECT count(t.id) FROM pub_vehicle t LEFT JOIN pub_driver t_driver on t_driver.id = t.driverid LEFT JOIN pub_vehcline t1 ON t.vehclineid = t1.Id and t1.`Status`='1' and t1.platformtype = #{platformtype} LEFT JOIN pub_vehcbrand t2 ON t1.vehcBrandID = t2.Id and t2.`Status`='1' and t2.platformtype =#{platformtype} LEFT JOIN op_vehcline_models_ref t3 ON t.vehclineid = t3.vehclineid and t3.`Status` ='1' LEFT JOIN op_vehiclemodels t4 ON t4.Id = t3.vehiclemodelsid and t4.`Status` = '1' WHERe t.platformtype = #{platformtype} and t.`Status`='1' and t.vehclineid = t1.Id

SELECT pub_vehcline.id AS id, CONCAT( CONCAT(pub_vehcbrand.`Name`, ' '), pub_vehcline.`name` ) AS text FROM pub_vehcline, pub_vehcbrand WHERE pub_vehcline.vehcBrandID = pub_vehcbrand.Id AND pub_vehcline.`Status` = 1 AND pub_vehcbrand.`Status` = 1
and pub_vehcbrand.platformtype = #{platformType} and pub_vehcline.platformtype = #{platformType}
and CONCAT( CONCAT(pub_vehcbrand.`Name`, ' '), pub_vehcline.`name` ) like "%"#{id}"%"
GROUP BY id ORDER BY convert(CONCAT( CONCAT(pub_vehcbrand.`Name`, ' '), pub_vehcline.`name` ) using gbk) ASC
SELECT op_vehiclemodels.`name` AS serviceCars, op_vehiclemodels.`id` AS id FROM op_vehiclemodels WHERE op_vehiclemodels.`Status` = 1 GROUP BY op_vehiclemodels.`name` ORDER BY op_vehiclemodels.`level`

SELECT pub_vehicle.*, CONCAT( CONCAT(pub_vehcbrand.`Name`, ' '), pub_vehcline.`name` ) AS brandCars, (SELECT pub_dictionary.text FROM pub_dictionary WHERE pub_dictionary.type='车牌省' AND pub_dictionary.`value`= pub_vehicle.platenoprovince AND pub_dictionary.`status`=1) AS plateNoProvinceName, (SELECT pub_dictionary.text FROM pub_dictionary WHERE pub_dictionary.type='车牌市' AND pub_dictionary.`value`= pub_vehicle.platenocity AND pub_dictionary.`status`=1) AS plateNoCityName, (SELECT pub_cityaddr.city FROM pub_cityaddr WHERE pub_cityaddr.`status`=1 AND pub_cityaddr.id = pub_vehicle.city) AS cityName, (SELECT pub_cityaddr.markid FROM pub_cityaddr WHERE pub_cityaddr.`status`=1 AND pub_cityaddr.id = pub_vehicle.city) AS citymarkid FROM pub_vehicle, pub_vehcline, pub_vehcbrand WHERE pub_vehicle.id = #{id} AND pub_vehicle.vehclineid = pub_vehcline.Id AND pub_vehcline.vehcBrandID = pub_vehcbrand.Id
SELECT * FROM pub_dictionary WHERE pub_dictionary.type="车牌省" AND pub_dictionary.`status`=1
SELECT * FROM pub_dictionary AS p WHERE p.parentid = ( SELECT id FROM pub_dictionary WHERE pub_dictionary.type = "车牌省" AND pub_dictionary.`status` = 1 AND pub_dictionary.`value` = #{id} )

SELECT t.id, t.vehicletype, t4.`name` AS serviceCars, t.boundstate, t.vehiclestatus, getPlatenoStr(t.platenoprovince,t.platenocity,t.plateno) as platenoStr, CONCAT(t2.`Name`," ",t1.`name`) AS brandCars, t.vin, t.color, t.loads, getCityStr(t.city) as cityStr FROM pub_vehicle t LEFT JOIN pub_driver t_driver on t_driver.id = t.driverid LEFT JOIN pub_vehcline t1 ON t.vehclineid = t1.Id and t1.`Status`='1' and t1.platformtype = #{platformtype} LEFT JOIN pub_vehcbrand t2 ON t1.vehcBrandID = t2.Id and t2.`Status`='1' and t2.platformtype =#{platformtype} LEFT JOIN op_vehcline_models_ref t3 ON t.vehclineid = t3.vehclineid and t3.`Status` ='1' LEFT JOIN op_vehiclemodels t4 ON t4.Id = t3.vehiclemodelsid and t4.`Status` = '1' WHERe t.platformtype = #{platformtype} and t.`Status`='1' and t.vehclineid = t1.Id
ORDER BY CONVERT ( getCityStr(t.city) USING gbk ) COLLATE gbk_chinese_ci, t.vehicletype DESC, CONVERT((t4.`name`)USING gbk)COLLATE gbk_chinese_ci,t_driver.`workstatus` DESC
SELECT pub_dictionary.VALUE, pub_dictionary.id FROM pub_dictionary WHERE pub_dictionary.type = "车牌省" AND pub_dictionary. STATUS = 1 AND pub_dictionary.text = #{plateOne}
SELECT pub_dictionary.VALUE FROM pub_dictionary WHERE pub_dictionary.type = "车牌市" AND pub_dictionary. STATUS = 1 AND pub_dictionary.text = #{text} AND pub_dictionary.parentid = #{id}
SELECT pub_cityaddr.id FROM pub_cityaddr WHERE pub_cityaddr.city like #{city}"市" or pub_cityaddr.city = #{city} AND pub_cityaddr. STATUS = 1

SELECT pub_vehcline.id FROM pub_vehcbrand, pub_vehcline WHERE pub_vehcline.vehcBrandID = pub_vehcbrand.Id AND CONCAT(pub_vehcbrand.`Name`,' ',pub_vehcline.`name`) = #{brandCars}
and pub_vehcline.platformtype = #{platformType} and pub_vehcbrand.platformtype = #{platformType} and pub_vehcline.status = '1'

SELECT pub_vehicle_scope.*, ( SELECT city FROM pub_cityaddr WHERE pub_cityaddr.id = pub_vehicle_scope.cityid AND pub_cityaddr.`status` = 1 ) AS cityName FROM pub_vehicle_scope WHERE pub_vehicle_scope.vehicleid = #{id} AND pub_vehicle_scope.`Status` = 1

select t1.id,getPlatenoStr(t1.platenoprovince,t1.platenocity,t1.plateno) as platenoStr, getCityStr(t1.city) as cityStr,(@rownum := @rownum + 1) AS rownum, t2.workstatus as driverState from pub_vehicle t1 left join pub_driver t2 on t1.driverid = t2.id, (SELECT @rownum := 0) r where t1.platformtype = #{platformtype} and t1.status ='1'
limit #{iDisplayStart}, #{iDisplayLength}

sql.if: and t1.id in (select a.vehicleid from pub_driver_vehicle_ref a where a.driverid = #{driverid} and a.vehicleid = t1.id)

and getPlatenoStr(pub_vehicle.platenoprovince,pub_vehicle.platenocity,pub_vehicle.plateno) like concat('%', #{plateno}, '%')
